scripts.make: mkdir sass && mkdir css && touch sass/style.scss && mkdir script && touch script/index.js && touch index.html && touch .gitignore && echo node_modules/ > .gitignore && mkdir assets
scripts.predeploy: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp *.html dist && cd dist && mkdir css && mkdir assets && cp ../css/style.css css/ && cp -r ../assets/* assets
